steps.name: Kırmızı Et menu should be appeared
The user enters Dana Haslamalık Et to search box
The user clicks Sepete Ekle button
The user enters 120 gramlık paketler şeklinde hazırlanmasını istiyorum to note textbox
The user adds product for min limit
Information of the product should be right
The user clicks on Sepeti Onayla button
Selecting Adress page should be opened
